name: Fast ClickFunnels
author: FastFlow.io

sections.description:
Connect your ClickFunnels account to the FastMember content protection system. Record your ClickFunnels transactions and grant access to users who purchase through your ClickFunnels order forms.

All thats needed is to install the plugin. As long as you have licensed version of FastMember running you will see ClickFunnels webhook details in your product settings.

Supports order bumps and subscription products.

ClickFunnels® is the premier service for building complete funnels for any marketing campaign. High converting email optin funnels or complex membership funnels.

Sign up for ClickFunnels Here

FastMember gives you unlimited flexibility in setting up your WordPress membership site. When used with ClickFunnels as the front end page builder for your marketing pages you can create a powerhouse system for delivering your content with WordPress.

Sign up for FastMember Here

Disclosure: FastFlow.io is an independent ClickFunnels Affiliate, not an employee. FastFlow.io receive referral payments from ClickFunnels. The opinions expressed here are FastFlow.io own and are not official statements of ClickFunnels or its parent company, Etison LLC.
sections.installation:
Easy Installation: In your WordPress dashboard go to Plugins > Add New and search for “fast clickfunnels” and you will be able to quickly install the latest version of the plugin.

Updates will be ready automatically and you will be notified in your dashboard.

Manual Installation: Download the Fast ClickFunnels WordPress plugin .zip file. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation via a FTP and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Do I Need a ClickFunnels Account?

Yes. A clickfunnels account is required to use this plugin. If you are not already a member you can sign up for your account and transform the way you run your online business.

Do I Need a FastMember Account?

Yes. A FastMember account is also required to use this plugin. If you are not already a member you can sign up for your account and turn your WordPress site into powerful content protection and payment processing system.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1

Support for Fast Member Pro

Version 1.0.9.4

  • Correction to panel HTML

Version 1.0.9.3

  • Update ClickFunnels trademark and branding

Version 1.0.9.2

  • Update for user subscription cancellation status

Version 1.0.9.1

  • Update for Fast Stripe onsite cancellations

Version 1.0.9

  • Update refunded status

Version 1.0.8

  • Ignore failed orders from payload

Version 1.0.7

  • Support for more than one ClickFunnels product in each FastMember product using CSV

Version 1.0.6

  • Parsing of name values to Fast Member user profile

Version 1.0.5

  • Updated the recurring payment process.
  • Fixed the bug regarding expired user subscription renewal process.

Version 1.0.4

  • Update for accordion modules in FastMember 1.3

Version 1.0.3

  • Webhook script re-written to handle received JSON format data from ClickFunnels.
  • added support to handle stripe subscriptions
  • Code added to update WP user’s role every time a new FastMember membership created.

Version 1.0.2

  • Webhook script re-written to handle received JSON format data from ClickFunnels.

Version 1.0.1

  • Stable working version launched to repository.

short_description: Connect your ClickFunnels account to your FastMember WordPress site. Use the ClickFunnels webhook to automatically add users to FastMember products.
